Articles.Content:
I use the minimalistic flag from the games flag Folder as the top layer with some layer type adjustments. It is possible with Photoshop an Gimp.

Edit: Except the black/dark ones, there it is in the background (color reversion)

Edited October 15, 2013 by MadHorse

-images snipped-

Funktastic! Thanks!

Fantastic work being done here, and finally I have a flag design I want to see made, if someone would be so kind as to oblige me!

A trio of right-facing crescents (i.e. the crescent is on the left side, with the "points" pointing right, but canted upward a bit):

The first is the largest, and green.

The second is smaller, and gray.

The third is even smaller, and minty green.

Each crescent should be seated higher than the previous, so that you feel like you're looking up higher as your eyes get to each.

A red "swoosh" similar to the one on NASA's flag should seem to represent a ship leaving Kerbin toward Minmus and beyond (the crescents represent the Kerbin local system, in case that wasn't obvious).

All on a blue or light blue background, with a few white stars scattered about. And with that awesome ripple effect, because that looks spectacular!

Also, could I request the Photoshop/Gimp file with the separate layers as well, so that I can make any little tweaks I feel are needed without harassing any of you artistic folk? I'm just "that guy" who has to have things exactly right, but I don't want to take away your time just to satisfy my control freak-ness!

'I want navy blue everywhere except the circle'

It's also blue for the moment...but i can change it anytime if you want.

No, fine by me. I just wanted a darker color, but it'll work.

No, fine by me. I just wanted a darker color, but it'll work.

quick colorchange

Beautiful, thanks MadHorse!! A darker background than I had envisioned, but I like this better! You're right about the swoosh, I'll try to play with that a bit, see if I can't make it work; worst-case scenario I'll just drop it.

I would like to request a non-textured flag of the Pleiades, in a similar colour scheme, but with no background stars, just the seven brightest stars represented by stylized diamonds (like the stars on Kromey's flag).

Could you make a flag featuring this lander: http://i.imgur.com/0bAkuyx.png

similar in style to the first flag you made for me, this one:

With orange and blue, maybe?

Edit: I have idea Black sky, Orange craft, and Minmus colored ground.

Edited October 16, 2013 by MinerEdgar

I would like to request a non-textured flag of the Pleiades, in a similar colour scheme, but with no background stars, just the seven brightest stars represented by stylized diamonds (like the stars on Kromey's flag).
Pretty slick, slick50.

I would like to request a flag for the Kerbin Socialist Party (KSP). However, this can not be the commercialized flag of capitalist fame. This must be Kommunist high art!

Specifications:

It would be cool if you could include a Kerbal in Soviet esqe space propaganda.

Example:

http://russiatrek.org/blog/wp-content/uploads/2011/07/soviet-space-program-propaganda-poster-23.jpg

Alternatively, kerbal Lenin with a lampshade on his head.

I am sure someone will make better but here we go:

Edit: and I missed your request about kerbal in flag... so someone else should do it. =)

Edited October 16, 2013 by TUFOM
Love it! Thanks slick50 :-)

Hey guys,

I am from Germany and I love the Union Jacks you did. I used it quite a lot allthough i am not from the UK.

So here is my request:

Could you do something with this flag?

Make the eagle bigger so it has a better visibility when used in the game or do something completely different with it

Could you do something with this flag?

Make the eagle bigger so it has a better visibility when used in the game or do something completely different with it

Something different: used the eurocoin eagle (see it every day; still disappointed we didn't put our roaring lion on ours), and the basic layout of my own flag:

Just bigger, and off-centre:

Cheers.
Looks nice Speijker. But can you do the lower one with the eagle centered just for comparison?

Looks nice Speijker. But can you do the lower one with the eagle centered just for comparison?

Sure.

Personally I quite like the first one though...

And: Kermany!
